QuestData.Title: Hell Hath a Fury
QuestData.Description: It is now time for you to punish my three high priests: Mu'funu, Tua-Tua, and Hawinni. You'll find them spread around the altar grounds.$B$BTake this hexxing stick. I've empowered it with my rage and indignation. I'm sure that it will prove potent.$B$BJust use it and proceed to destroy them. The hex will take care of the rest.$B$B<Quetz'lun displays a toothy grin.>$B$BSucceed and I may let you go. Fail and die.
QuestData.LogDescription: Quetz'lun's Spirit at the Altar of Quetz'lun wants you to use Quetz'lun's Hexxing Stick upon High Priest Mu'funu, High Priestess Tua-Tua, and High Priest Hawinni. Once you have done this, slay them.
QuestData.CompletionText: DO YOU THINK THAT I'M A FOOL?$B$BTHEY'RE NOT DEAD!
QuestData.RewardText: <The terrible spirit before you lets loose a blood-chilling cackle.>$B$BThey had it coming. And I'll give them more of the same again and again and again....

Objectives.Objective: High Priest Mu'funu hexed at death
High Priestess Tua-Tua hexed at death
High Priest Hawinni hexed at death
